title: Languages Configuration
description: There should always be a "Default" and all others can have any name you want.

hideOthers.description: Hide languages which are not listed here, even if enabled in Oqtane.

languages.title: Languages to show in this scenario/menu

language.title: Language code of this language - usually "en" or "de-CH"
language.description: This is the identifier of the specific language as it's installed in Oqtane.

label.description:
Label of the button in the menu, typically "EN" or something similar. 
 If not provided, it will automatically use the 2 characters of the language name.

description.description:
Long name of the language to show in the tooltip. 
 If not given, will take the description of the .net framework for this language.
